name: END OF VERSE 23,194,973,137
description:
A DEBT REPAID AT ALL COSTS;
THE POWER OF GOD IS ABSOLUTE.

END OF VERSE 23,194,973,137 is a short linear visual novel made for VN CUP.

Follow Vouxeine, an immortal being whose sole purpose in life is poetry, as they consider an imminent debt weighing down upon them. Look a little into the nature of immortal beings, confront imminent ideological death, and experiences girls' love..?!

This game should take ~20 minutes to complete. Available in English only.

[a game which takes place within the same world as the XAVINETICA, made by XAVIENCE LABS]
